text: Temnocinclis is a monotypic genus of sea snails in family Sutilizonidae containing the single species Temnocinclis euripes. This mollusc, a species of slit-limpet that measures up to four millimeters long, lives at hydrothermal vents.McLean, J. H. (1989). New slit-limpets from hydrothermal vents, Part 1. ==Species== * Temnocinclis euripes McLean, 1989 ==References== * Geiger D.L. (2012) Monograph of the little slit shells. Volume 1. Introduction, Scissurellidae. pp. 1-728. Volume 2. Anatomidae, Larocheidae, Depressizonidae, Sutilizonidae, Temnocinclidae. pp. 729–1291. title: Temnocinclis
